articles.title: UNDP assistance projects completed
articles.content: Past news

articles.title: National artistic photograph show for April 15
articles.content:
UNDP assistance projects completed
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Stevia-processing project, the battery production modernization project and the construction design modernisation project have been completed, according to the assistance program between the DPRK and the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP).
   With the completion of the projects firm scientific, technical and material foundations have been laid to develop local stevia processing and battery industries on a high level and designing, drawing and budget compilation have been computerized. 
   The commissioning ceremonies were held on the spot on Thursday.
   The ceremonies were attended by Kim Jong U, Vice-Chairman of the State External Economic Affairs Commission, and officials concerned as well as employees of factories. Also present was Christian Lemaire, resident representative of the UNDP.
   Speeches were made at the ceremonies.
   The participants looked round the equipment of the projects.

articles.title: Mongolia-Korea parliamentary group formed
articles.content:
National artistic photograph show for April 15
   Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A national artistic photograph show opened at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre Thursday to commemorate the 85th birth anniversary of  President Kim Il Sung.
   On display there are over 100 artistic photographs. 
   Most of the pictures show the greatness and noble traits of President Kim Il Sung and Secretary Kim Jong Il, who performed immortal exploits for the country and the people, for the times and humankind by pioneering  the revolutionary cause of Juche and leading it to victory.  
   Among the exhibits are pictures reflecting the Korean people's ardent yearning and reverence for the president, the working efforts of people, and the military training of servicemen, achievements in science, education, literature and art and other fields, as well as beautiful landscape of the country.
   Kim Ki Nam, Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, made an opening address. 
   After the opening ceremony the participants saw round the exhibits.

articles.title: Receptions on April 15 holiday
articles.content:
Mongolia-Korea parliamentary group formed
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A Mongolia-Korea parliamentary group was inaugurated in Ulaanbaatar on Apr. 3.
   B. Batbayar, member of the State Great Ikh Hural, was elected chairman of the group and the vice-chairman of the State Great Ikh Hural and other legislators members of the group.

articles.title: Diplomatic staffers visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
Receptions on April 15 holiday
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to Korea Seyed Morteza Mirheidari and Palestinian Ambassador to Korea Shaher Mohammed arranged receptions respectively on Thursday with the approach of the birth anniversary of the  President Kim Il Sung.
   Invited to the receptions were vice-presidents and politburo members of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea Ri Jong Ok and Pak Song Chol and officials concerned.
   Addressing the reception, the Iranian Ambassador said President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime devoted his all to the development of Korean politics, economy and culture. 
   Noting relations between Iran and Korea have been established on the road of struggle against imperialism, he said the friendly relations between the two countries would be everlasting in the future.
   The Palestinian Ambassador said in his speech that the Palestinian people value the friendship and revolutionary unity between the two peoples, which were arranged by President Kim Il Sung and President Yasser Arafat, and are making efforts to strengthen the friendship and unity which have been further consolidating and developing under the leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   He expressed firm belief that the Korean people, in hearty response to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and under the leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il, would achieve the country's reunification by means of confederacy on the basis of the three principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity with the concerted efforts of the entire nation.

articles.title: Official commendations to exemplary workers and youths
articles.content:
Diplomatic staffers visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
   Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councillors corps in Korea and foregin Embassy officials concerning cultural and friendly relations visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on April 10.
   They paid reverence to President Kim Il Sung before his Statue and went upstairs to make bows to him who lies in state.
   They looked round the relics used by the President.
   They made an entry in the visitor's book.
   Anwar Al-Fadel, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Syrian Embassy here, wrote that they will always advance together with the Korean people, who struggle to achieve the peace and progress of the world.
  Nirsia Castro Guevara, councillor of the Cuban Embassy here, wrote that President  Kim Il Sung lives forever in the hearts of the progressive humankind of the world as well as the Korean people.

articles.title: S. Korean puppets denounced for ridiculous argument about "unification"
articles.content:
Official commendations to exemplary workers and youths 
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Official commendations were given to exemplary workers, youths and children on the threshold of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   The title of DPRK Labour Hero was awarded to two persons including Sin Jae Chon, section chief of the hospital attached to Pyongyang University of Medicine, the order of Kim Il Sung to Jong Ung Hwan, secretary of the primary party committee of the Mansudae Art Studio, and 21 others, and the Kim Il Sung Prize to department director of the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House Rim Su Ung and a teacher of Kim Chaek University of Technology Kim Tong Sin.
   And the Kim Il Sung Youth Honour Prize were granted to 98 young people and the Kim Il Sung Children Honour Prize to 168 children.
   Awarding ceremonies took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
   Rri Jong Ok, politburo member of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and Vice-President of the DPRK, was present at the ceremonies.

articles.title: S. Koreans urged to struggle for new regime
articles.content:
S. Korean puppets denounced for ridiculous argument about "unification" 
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- With a view to slandering the system in north Korea, the south Korean puppets are spreading the fiction of "instability" and crying for coping with "possible developments" and establishing a "full-time organisation for reunification".
   In another development, the Minister of the "National Unification Board" during his visit to Japan said that Japan's cooperation is important because the unification of the Korean Peninsula is a problem of the international community.
   The Kim Young Sam group, struck with fear to hear words of reunification from among the south Korean people and students, are invoking the fascist "National Security Law"  to suppress them.  The world people are criticising Kim Young Sam for obstructing the efforts for national reunification. In August last year the Kim Young Sam group suppressed the patriotic reunification movement of the south Korean students at the point of bayonet.
   It is the height of impudence for the group to talk about unification.
   The group have no intention to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the nation.
   Their argument about "unification" is no more than a trick to cover up their crimes they committed against the nation as the separatists.
   The south Korean puppets are now in the grip of serious politico-economic crisis. It is ridiculous for them to talk about the "instability" of the system in the north Korea and to try to realize such a daydream as "unification by prevailing over communism" with the backing of outsiders.
   The man-centered socialism of Korean style is not affected by the fast-changing international situation, but growing stronger with each passing day.
   The people and army in the northern half of Korea have an absolute trust in their own system and are ready to become human bombs to defend it.
   The south Korean puppets should be mindful that their attempt to undermine the system and do harm to the people and army is as foolish as trying to break a rock with an egg.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on political farce
articles.content:
S. Koreans urged to struggle for new regime 
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Central Committees of the General Federation of Trade Unions and the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and other public organizations in the DPRK made public an appeal to the south Korean people on Thursday.
   The appeal said that all the people in the south should vigorously turn out in the patriotic popular uprising to topple the corrupt "civilian" regime and establish an independent and democratic, new government.
   Democratic politics can be found nowhere in south Korea and the "national assembly" has been reduced to a foul waiting maid of power, who protects the "civilian" 
dictatorship, it pointed out, and said: Even, an unemployed idler without any official duty is manipulating, at the back of his father, all the "state affairs" and the ruling party to act as a little king of irregularities. And all shades of statesmen are appropriating "national funds" with the help of power, putting society in disorder.
   The present regime's corruptness and incompetency have been driving the south Korean economy to a phase of total bankruptcy and the people's livelihood to the greatest misery. Notwithstanding this, some blinders of the political upper strata are "compromising" with Kim Young Sam and currying favour with him. This is nothing but a drama of accomplices to save themselves.
   With Kim Young Sam remaining in power,  the people in the south will go deep into misfortune and, furthermore, the entire fellow countrymen will suffer from it, the appeal said, and stressed.
   The people from all sectors in south Korea should count the crimes of the Kim Young Sam "civilian" group and scathingly break with him.
   They should give a strong alarm to those who are "compromising" with Kim Young Sam, afraid of his threat "fellow-suicide".
   Workers and other people should add fuel to the already-kindled flames of struggle to totally nullify the fascist labour law and the "law on the agency for national security 
Planning".

articles.title: War drills under fire
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on political farce 
   Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The "hearing at the national assembly" now under way in south Korea is a compromising burlesque between Kim Young Sam who is trying to flee from the responsibility for the crimes as the principal culprit of the Hanbo loan scandal and stay longer in power and the opposition party charlatans who are involved in the scandal, says Rodong Sinmun today.
   The analyst goes on: There is a Korean saying that a thief cannot catch the other thief.
   The recent "hearing" convinced the south Koreans that with the Kim Young Sam group remaining in power, it is impossible to prevent such power-backed scandals as an acute cancer prevalent in south Korea and to bring social justice and democracy. 
   The south Korean people from all walks of life should not be deceived by the appeasement and trick of Kim Young Sam, the principal culprit of the Hanbo corruption scandal, and the opposition party charlatans who are in league with the traitor, but continue their already-started struggle for the probe into the truth behind the Hanbo incident as well as the struggle against Kim Young Sam and fascist law.

articles.title: Press review
articles.content:
War drills under fire 
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today comments on the war drills codenamed "97 Rsoi" and "Hoguk-97" in south Korea.
   At a time when south Korea is in the grip of unprecedented political and economic crisis, the puppets are carrying on the adventurous war rehearsals with outside forces. This is a premeditated provocative move to further key up the situation of the Korean Peninsula and drive the situation to a worst phase, the news analyst says and goes on:  The war drills are attributable to the despicable intrigues of a master and a stooge who are gripped by uneasiness over the crisis of the traitorous "government".
   Although the United States has promised the improvement of relations with the DPRK through the DPRK-U.S. framework agreement, it is launching war exercises against the northern half of Korea together with the puppets, which is a behaviour of turning down the framework agreement and a betrayal to the DPRK.
   The right of choice rests not with the U.S. only. 
   We cannot tolerate the Kim Young Sam group, who are faced with deepest ruling crisis for their traitorous crimes, in trying to find a way out in confrontation and war moves against the northern half of Korea.
   Once a serious situation occurs on the Korean Peninsula, the responsibility for it will be held entirely by the U.S. hawkish elements and the warlike south Korean puppets.

articles.title: Kim Young Sam group hit for frantic suppression of "Hanchongryon"
articles.content:
Press review 
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Papers here today frontpage reports that Secretary  Kim Jong Il, Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army, highly praised servicemen and employees of a unit of the people's army for sincerely assisting the railway service and sent thanks to units and working people for whole-heartedly assisting the soldier-builders of the Anbyon Youth Power Station.
   Taking much space of papers are accounts of ceremonies for commemorating the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung held at home and abroad.
   Given in Rodong Sinmun is the news that preparatory committees for April 15 holiday were inaugurated and commemorations were held in different countries.
   Figuring large in the press are an account of the national seminar on the Juche idea held in Pyongyang and a report delivered by Choe Thae Bok, alternate polituro member and Secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and speeches at the seminar.
   A loyalty-pledging meeting was held by students of Kim Il Sung University, the national artistic photograph exhibition and the national fine art exhibition of amateurs were opened, says the press.
   According to the press, foreign Embassy officials in Pyongyang, engaged in cultural and friendly relations affairs, and the economic and commercial councillors' corps visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay respects to President Kim Il Sung and saw the Korean documentary "The Great Life in 1994".
   Rodong Sinmun reports that Iranian and Palestinian ambassadors to Korea arranged receptions with the approach of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Conspicuous in the paper is a political essay underlining that to hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung for all ages as the leader of revolution is an unshakable faith of the Korean people.
   On the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the publication of Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Vigorously Continuing the Struggle to Correct Working Method and Style", the paper runs an article headlined "wise leadership in establishing President Kim Il Sung's method of work".
   Seen in the paper is a revolutionary anecdote saying Secretary Kim Jong Il led officials to work in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
   Minju Joson carries an article saying the famous revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" is the one of praise and faith of the Korean people for the peerless great man and reflections of the song upon people of various strata. 
   Papers inform the readers of the completion of the UNDP-assisted projects.
   Rodong Sinmun comes out with commentaries criticising war drills against north korea by the U.S. forces and the south Korean puppets and Kim Young Sam's despicable political trick to cover up his crime.
   The press conveys an account of the closing of the Foreign Ministers' meeting of non-aligned countries.

articles.title: Students vow to prepare themselves to be faithful revolutionaries
articles.content:
Kim Young Sam group hit for frantic suppression of "Hanchongryon"
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The director of the youth and student affairs department of the C.C, National Democratic Front of South Korea (NDFSK) issued a press statement on April 7 denouncing the Kim Young Sam group for their suppressive move against the South Korean Federation Of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon), which is getting more vicious nowadays, the Seoul-based radio voice of national salvation said.
   The Kim Young Sam group are scheming to obliterate, at one sweep, "Hanchongryon," the vanguard organization of one million students by means of hardening the "new security-oriented" suppression of campus movement and escalating behind-the-scene subversive work against it, the statement said, criticising it as a vicious challenge to students and people of various strata aspiring after independence, democracy and reunification.
   The Kim Young Sam group have sunk into a worst crisis and they are making effort to find a way out in obliterating "Hanchongryon" and, furthermore, stamping out all pro-democracy forces, it noted, saying:
   The NDFSK strongly urges the Kim Young Sam group to suspend, at once, the fascist suppression and subversive moves against "Hanchongryon" and immediately release the arrested patriotic students.
   If the Kim Young Sam group persist in suppression of "Hanchongryon" turning a deaf ear to popular sentiments and the trend of times, it will precipitate their shameful destruction, the statement warned.

articles.title: National simposium on achievements of Pres. Kim Il Sung held in Nepal
articles.content:
Students vow to prepare themselves to be faithful revolutionaries
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Students of Kim Il Sung University vowed to firmly prepare themselves to be revolutionaries boundlessly loyal to Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   A loyal meeting was held on April 10 in front of the Statue of President Kim Il Sung on Ryongnam Hill.
   The meeting called on all students to firmly prepare themselves to be true students who under the slogan "let us follow the example of General Kim Jong Il" worship him and uphold his idea and leadership with loyalty with absolute.  
   All the students should continue to improve and train themselves in a revolutionary organisational way of life and make scientific research and study from the Juche-based stand following the noble example of the revolutionary method of study set by the respected general, said the meeting.
   An appeal to the students throughout the country was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Presidential work published in Uganda
articles.content:
National simposium on achievements of Pres. Kim Il Sung held in Nepal
   Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on the great life and exploits of President Kim Il Sung was held in Kathmandu on Apr. 4 with the approach of his birth anniversary April 15.
   In his report at the symposium, Manik Lal Shrestha, director of the Nepal Institute for Juche Studies and chairman of the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, noted that the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung is the greatest national holiday of the Korean people and an auspicious day for the world people who love peace and defend independence.
   It is an important exploit of President Kim Il Sung in the history of the international communist movement that he victoriously led the Korean revolution and built socialist Korea, he stressed, and went on:
   "Comrade Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and applied it to the Korean revolution. 
   "Juche Korea has been built with the embodiment of the Juche idea and his idea is the guideline of struggle to all the world revolutionaries."
   Man Mohan Adhikari, former Prime Minister and President of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), noted in his speech that comrade Kim Il Sung liberated the country and had led the Korean revolution to a victory.
   He resolved all the matters arising in the revolution and construction, keeping ideological work ahead of all other work and getting masses on the move, man Mohan Adhikari said, adding: His cause is now being successfully carried forward by Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   Narayan Man Bijukchhe, chairman of the C. C., The Nepal Worker-Peasant Party, said that Korea has demonstrated its socialist mettle, frustrating the imperialists' aggression and interference because it is led by the great leader and guided by the Juche idea.
   He noted that the Juche idea is a valuable ideological theory for the progressives of the world as well as Nepal when they believe in and depend on the popular masses.
   Keshar Jung Rayamajy, chairman of the Democratic Socialist Party of Nepal, said though comrade Kim Il Sung passed away, he will always be with them and his idea and exploits powerfully encourage the struggle of the Korean people and the world people.
   A letter to Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the symposium.

articles.title: Foreign diplomas in Korea visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Presidential work published in Uganda
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was published in booklet by the Kamanire Publishing House of Uganda on April 2 on the occasion of his birth anniversary April 15.

articles.title: For. students study reminiscencec of Pres. Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign diplomas in Korea visit Mangyongdae 
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The foreign military attaches corps in Korea visited Mangyongdae, the birth place of President Kim Il Sung, on Thursday on the threshold of his birth anniversary.
   The attaches saw round the relics preserved in his old home and planted trees.
   Cuban military attache Arnaldo Fernandez Rodriguez, who is doyen of the corps, wrote in the visitor's book: 
   Freedom and independence of the DPRK will be reliably defended and the exploits of President Kim Il Sung will remain forever as comrade Marshal Kim Jong Il, the great leader, wisely leads the Korean people's struggle.
   On the same day, foreign embassy officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations appreciated the Korean documentary film "The Great Life in 1994" at the People's Palace of Culture in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Wise leadership to apply Presidential method of work
articles.content:
For. students study reminiscencec of Pres. Kim Il Sung 
   Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Chinese and Mongolian students studying in Korea held a meeting of public presentation on the volume 7 of the 1st part the anti-Japanese revolution (continuing edition) of the "With the Century", the reminiscences of  President Kim Il Sung, at the Kim Chaek University of Technology on Thursday on the occasion of his birth anniversary April 15.
   Speakers at the meeting said the reminiscences carrying the glorious history of the revolutionary activities, extraordinary wisdom, outstanding leadership ability and noble virtues of President Kim Il Sung is a motto of life and valuable ideological and mental pabulum.
   It is an immortal classic which could be written only by President Kim Il Sung, they stressed, adding that the reminiscences will be handed down generation after generation with his revolutionary history.

articles.title: Fathery leader is always with us
articles.content:
Wise leadership to apply Presidential method of work 
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today dedicates an article to the 20th anniversary of the publication of the work of Secretary Kim Jong Il "On Vigorously Continuing the Struggle to Correct Working Method and Style". 
   The article deals with the wise leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il in thoroughly establishing President Kim Il Sung's method of work. 
   The author of the article says:
   It was an unshakable faith of Secretary Kim Jong Il that there should be no other working method than President Kim Il Sung's in the Workers' Party of Korea founded and developed by the President and his method should be put into practice as it was.
   The General indicates the orientation and ways to thoroughly establish President Kim Il Sung's method of work to meet the requirements of the party and the revolution.
   As a great teacher of party officials at all times, he kindly leads them to actively learn from President Kim Il Sung's method of work and carry it into practice in Party work.
   General Kim Jong Il inspects the training of soldiers and takes warm care of their cultural living conditions and food supply when visiting units of the people's army, just as the President did.    
   Whenever the revolution is faced with difficulties, he visits the people's army soldiers,  just as the President visited workers and inspired them to tide over difficulties and open up an epochal phase. 
   As taught by the General, Party officials are determinedly improving their working method and style.    
   The article calls for actively learning from the leadership traits of Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK For. Ministry on treaty on building of nuclear-free zone in southeast Asia
articles.content:
Fathery leader is always with us 
  Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- We will make a gift of victory to the fatherly leader President Kim Il Sung on the April spring holiday every year with morality and conscience, faith and will to accomplish his revolutionary cause through storm and stress, praying for his immortality from the bottom of our hearts.
   Rodong Sinmun today says this in a political essay titled "fatherly leader is always with us."
   The political essay reads in part:
   The immortality of the president is what the Korean and world people sincerely wish and what the Korean communists absolutely believe. The Korean people are his family members forever and cannot live a moment apart from him.
   For his immortality, his soldiers and disciples should endlessly exalt the immortal feats performed by him for the victory of the revolution and the prosperity of the future generations. 
   He is always with us for his immortal feats and great benevolence. While faithfully exalting his feats, we are always with him.    
   His immortality is guaranteed by the steadfast faith and the noblest moral obligation of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   It is the revolutionary philosophy, outlook on life and the great morality and conscience of General Kim Jong Il to carry forward and accomplish in any adversity the revolutionary cause and feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for eternal prosperity of the Korean people and make the president immortal forever.
   The President is immortal and we are always with him on the road of invariably carrying forward his revolutionary cause, holding him in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche, under the leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
